adaa.analytics.rules.logic.induction

Class ClassificationFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • adaa.analytics.rules.logic.induction.AbstractFinder
      • adaa.analytics.rules.logic.induction.ClassificationFinder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationExpertFinder

    public class ClassificationFinder
extends AbstractFinder
    Class for growing and pruning classification rules.

    • Field Detail

      • precalculatedCoverings

        protected java.util.Map<com.rapidminer.example.Attribute,java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,IntegerBitSet>> precalculatedCoverings
        Map of precalculated coverings (time optimization). For each attribute there is a set of distinctive values. For each value there is a bit vector of examples covered.

      • precalculatedFilter

        protected java.util.Map<com.rapidminer.example.Attribute,java.util.Set<java.lang.Double>> precalculatedFilter
        Map of precalculated attribute filters (time optimization).

                                                                                                           ContingencyTable ct,

        Calculates rule quality and p-value on a training set. P-value is calculated using a hypergeometric statistical test.

        Parameters:

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        rule - Rule to be grown.
        dataset - Training set.
        uncovered - Set of positive examples yet uncovered by the model.

      • tryAddCondition

        public boolean tryAddCondition(Rule rule,
                               ConditionBase condition,
                               com.rapidminer.example.ExampleSet trainSet,
                               java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> covered,
                               IntegerBitSet coveredPositives,
                               IntegerBitSet coveredNegatives,
                               IntegerBitSet conditionCovered)
        Makes an attempt to add the condition to the rule.
        Parameters:
        rule - Rule to be updated.
        condition - Condition to be added.
        trainSet - Training set.
        covered - Set of examples covered by the rules.
        coveredPositives - Bit vector of positive examples in the entire training set.
        coveredNegatives - Bit vector of negative examples in the entire training set.
        conditionCovered - Bit vector of examples covered by the condition.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating whether condition has been added successfully.
